entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
